card1.card1Description: Our own fleet of modern equipment ensures fast and safe delivery of products to your address.

card2.card2Description: Streamlined processes and years of experience guarantee timely deliveries without delays.

card3.card3Description: Efficient production organization helps optimize costs and offer the best market prices.

card4.card4Description: We ensure stable extraction volumes and warehouse stocks so your orders are fulfilled without interruptions.

product1.title: Crushed Stone 5–10 mm
product1.about3: Crushed stone of 5–20 mm fraction is one of the most in-demand and versatile types of crushed rock. It is produced from hard rock (granite, limestone, gravel) by crushing and sorting. It is characterized by high strength, frost resistance, and moisture resistance.

product2.title: Crushed Stone 20–70 mm
product2.about3: Crushed stone of 0–5 mm fraction is ideal for concrete production, road surfaces, and landscaping. It is obtained by crushing and screening hard rock. It has high adhesion and excellent performance characteristics.

product3.title: Clinker 0–5 mm
product3.about3: Clinker is a type of crushed stone with predominantly wedge-shaped (sharp-angled) grains. It is produced from hard rock (granite, limestone, basalt) through multi-stage crushing and sorting. It is used in road construction, concrete structures, and drainage systems due to its strength and durability.

product4.title: Crushed Stone 5–20 mm
product4.about3: Crushed stone of 5–20 mm fraction is one of the most popular and versatile types of non-metallic materials, widely used in construction. It is produced by crushing hard rock (granite, limestone, basalt) and subsequent sorting.

product5.title: Clinker (64-100 mm)
product5.about3: Regular sand is extracted in open air. It is incompatible with components such as clay and other natural materials. It is very suitable for burning, filling wells, and landscaping. It is also used for initial backfilling before foundation preparation. After washing and screening, it is used more widely.

product6.title: Clinker (100-150 mm)
product6.about3: Regular sand is extracted in open air. It is incompatible with components such as clay and other natural materials. It is very suitable for burning, filling wells, and landscaping. It is also used for initial backfilling before foundation preparation. After washing and screening, it is used more widely.

product7.title: Clinker (150-300 mm)
product7.about3: Regular sand is extracted in open air. It is incompatible with components such as clay and other natural materials. It is very suitable for burning, filling wells, and landscaping. It is also used for initial backfilling before foundation preparation. After washing and screening, it is used more widely.

product8.title: Clinker (300-500 mm)
product8.about3: Regular sand is extracted in open air. It is incompatible with components such as clay and other natural materials. It is very suitable for burning, filling wells, and landscaping. It is also used for initial backfilling before foundation preparation. After washing and screening, it is used more widely.

product9.title: Clinker (500-1000 mm)
product9.about3: Regular sand is extracted in open air. It is incompatible with components such as clay and other natural materials. It is very suitable for burning, filling wells, and landscaping. It is also used for initial backfilling before foundation preparation. After washing and screening, it is used more widely.

aboutUs.about: We are a reliable partner in construction and supply of non-metallic materials in Tashkent and the region. Our team consists of experienced specialists who will help you find optimal solutions for any project. We value every client and guarantee high-quality services, efficiency, and an individual approach. The most modern equipment and technologies from Iran
aboutUs.title3: Production begins with the development of deposits and extraction of raw materials. Modern equipment and processing technologies allow us to produce products that meet high-quality standards.
aboutUs.title4: Our own fleet allows us to organize fast and reliable delivery of any volume of products. We guarantee timely deliveries without delays or disruptions.
